summary.para: Defines constants that specify the kind of output to retrieve from an . For use with the dxcOutKind parameter of and .
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] Text outputs returned from version 2 APIs are UTF-8 or UTF-16, depending on the -encoding option passed to the compiler.

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_OBJECT
member.summary: For , specifies a shader or library object.

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_SHADER_HASH
member.summary: For , specifies the DxcShaderHash of a shader or a shader with source info (-Zsb/-Zss).

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_DISASSEMBLY
member.summary: For or , specifies the output from disassembling.

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_HLSL
member.summary: For or , specifies the output from the preprocessor or rewriter.

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_TEXT
member.summary: For or , specifies other text, such as -ast-dump or -Odump.

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_REFLECTION
member.summary: For , specifies the RDAT part with reflection data.

member.name: DXC_OUT_KIND.DXC_OUT_ROOT_SIGNATURE
member.summary: For , specifies serialized root signature output.
